INSTRUCTION_FILE_TYPE: File to upload must be a CSV.
QUESTION_GROUP_SIZE: What is the size of the groups you want to form?
QUESTION_GROUP_MIN_INSTR: You must have at least 2 people per group
QUESTION_RESTRICTED_CONNECTION: Are there any users you prefer or do not want to match (optional)?
SELECT_MORE_THAN_ONE_USER: Please select more than one user!
SELECTION_INCONSISTENT_WITH_SIZE: Users selected not consistent with matching size
SELECTION_SIZE_CONSISTENCY_INSTR: Choose at least {{value}} to be consistent with the size chosen previously
MINIMUM_NUM_IN_PREFERRED_CONNECTION: The number of users in preferred connection must be {{value}}
